page.title: 05CALVERLEY ACTION GROUP
page.content: Calverley Residents Action Group_ CRAG_was formed in 1975 as a result of the proposal to build a road from Shipley to Leeds.This would have passed through Calverley Woods,to the north of the village,and would then have joined up with the proposed extension of the M1 Motorway at a point about a mile to the east of the village.Money was raised and objections and protests made resulting,eventually,in the withdrawal by the Government of the proposed Shipley to Leeds road. Whilst still being alive to the threat of new road proposals CRAG then began to try and help the inhabitants of Calverley in other ways.Every year CRAG provides bulbs for the school children to plant around the village.
